import React, { useState } from "react" import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from "react-router-dom" import { ThemeProvider } from "styled-components" import { themes } from "./theme" import { GlobalStyles } from "./global" import { CursorProvider } from "react-cursor-custom" import { settings } from "./portfolio" import { TooltipProvider } from "react-tooltip" import Main from "./containers/Main" import "./App.css" import "react-tooltip/dist/react-tooltip.css" import SingleProject from "./pages/projects/SingleProject" function App() { const [theme, setTheme] = useState(localStorage.getItem("theme") || "dark") const useCursor = settings.useCustomCursor return ( <>
{useCursor ? (
) : (
)}
) } export default App
